name: Insect Destructor
description:
This is my 3D First Person Shooter project.

Modifications:

  1. Created three complete interesting, comprehensive, and coherent levels.
  2. Added multiple additional levels and tied them in to create a logical progression in your game. 
  3. Modified the out-of-game menus in some significant and meaningful way.
  4. Scaled down the pitch of the main menu, in-game and boss melodies.
  5. Slightly changed the player controller script and lives display script(so that it displays the actual lives quantity).
  6. Modified the in-game GUI in a significant way: changed the health bar style, textures and colors, changed the weapon selection display, changed lives icon, changed ui backdrops and buttons.
  7. Changed weapon models and changed their colors and materials.
  8. Replaced the ammo pickups with the appropriate weapon models(and added the pickup animation script to them).
  9. Changed the skybox.

Credits:

Created by Nazar Chopyk
